Magnetic Organization System: Add a magnetic system on the inside of the refrigerator door to organize and display notes, shopping lists, and reminders.
Energy Efficiency Mode: Develop a mode that adjusts the temperature and energy usage based on the contents of the refrigerator, helping to reduce energy consumption.
Automated Freshness Monitoring: Implement sensors that monitor the freshness of perishable items and alert users when they are near expiration, reducing food waste.
Customizable Lighting: Allow users to customize the lighting inside the refrigerator to suit their preferences and create a more pleasant environment.
Smart Storage System: Develop a smart storage system that uses sensors and algorithms to organize items based on their expiration dates, usage frequency, and temperature requirements.
